name: RavenHeart Hospital: A Medical Visual Novel
name_original: RavenHeart Hospital: A Medical Visual Novel
description:
RavenHeart Hospital: A Medical Visual Novel is a game where you play as a young prodigal surgeon starting their residency at the world's greatest hospital. Inspired by classic surgery simulation games, romance visual novels, TV medical dramas and anime, you will master a variety of surgery specialties and romance (or befriend) your fellow doctors. Will sparks fly with the fiery paramedic? Will the cowboy surgeon say yeehaw or yee-naw? Is she really going to bring a raven into the OR (and on this date??) Featuring a variety of character stories, surgical operations and support for custom player-made stories, operations and characters, RavenHeart Hospital is your prescription for a good time. Is your heart pumping from a defibrillator or could this be love?

Features

  • +5 Storylines with unique surgical specializations!
  • Choose your doc's appearance!
  • Support for custom stories, characters and operations!
